message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $1,400,000. Let me know what you think.
Alice, your product is definitely interesting, but I'm not sure I can justify $1,400,000 at this time.  I'd be willing to pay $1,200,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While I value your business, $1,200,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $1,300,000?  This would still be a great deal for you, and it allows me to move forward with this sale.  Let me know your thoughts.
